001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.historyLog.BolusDeliveryHistoryLog;
005
006import java.time.Instant;
007import java.util.Set;
008
009/**
010 * Contains everything shared between {@link LastBolusStatusResponse} and {@link LastBolusStatusV2Response}
011 * except that the latter contains requestedVolume
012 *
013 * NOTE: Intentionally not a subclass of StatusMessage because status seems to be equal to 1 even
014 * when partially valid data is returned about the last bolus.
015 */
016public abstract class LastBolusStatusAbstractResponse extends Message {
017    public abstract int getStatus();
018    public abstract int getBolusId();
019    public abstract long getTimestamp();
020    public abstract Instant getTimestampInstant();
021    public abstract long getDeliveredVolume();
022    public abstract int getBolusStatusId();
023    public enum BolusStatus {
024        // TODO: this is guesswork and is incomplete
025        STOPPED_USER_TERMINATED(0),
026        STOPPED_ALARM(1),
027        STOPPED_MALFUNCTION(2),
028        COMPLETE(3),
029        STOPPED_WIRELESS(4),
030        REJECTED_WIRELESS(5),
031        TERMINATED_PLGS(6),
032        ;
033
034        private final int id;
035        BolusStatus(int id) {
036            this.id = id;
037        }
038
039        public int id() {
040            return id;
041        }
042
043        public static BolusStatus fromId(int id) {
044            for (BolusStatus s : values()) {
045                if (s.id() == id) {
046                    return s;
047                }
048            }
049            return null;
050        }
051    }
052
053    public BolusStatus getBolusStatus() {
054        return BolusStatus.fromId(getBolusStatusId());
055    }
056    public abstract int getBolusSourceId();
057    public BolusDeliveryHistoryLog.BolusSource getBolusSource() {
058        return BolusDeliveryHistoryLog.BolusSource.fromId(getBolusSourceId());
059    }
060    public abstract int getBolusTypeBitmask();
061    public Set<BolusDeliveryHistoryLog.BolusType> getBolusType() {
062        return BolusDeliveryHistoryLog.BolusType.fromBitmask(getBolusTypeBitmask());
063    }
064    public abstract long getExtendedBolusDuration();
065}
